DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to evaluate collagen turnover in patients with multiple hernias
DOC.brief_title: Collagen Alterations in Patients With Abdominal Wall Hernias
DOC.detailed_description: Venous blood was collected and markers for type IV and V collagen synthesis and breakdown was measured
DOC.criteria: patients with a history of three hernia repairs (multiple hernia group) patients without any history or presence of hernias (control group) connective tissue disorder (EhlersDanloss/Marfan) presence of hernia upon clinical examination (control group)
